name: NPR
text: What did it take for Chadwick Boseman to become one of the biggest movie stars of the past decade? Today on #NPRConsiderThis, we look at his path and what his success reveals about race in America — and in Hollywood. https://t.co/y8xlfosr4z

name: NPR
text:
D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser said outside agitators came to the city over the weekend, intent on battling police. 70% of those arrested in the unrest came from outside D.C., police say.
https://t.co/mWVU4ExqkF

name: NPR
text:
President Trump declined to condemn the actions of the suspected 17-year-old shooter of 3 protesters against police brutality in Kenosha — claiming, without evidence, that it appeared the gunman was acting in self-defense.
https://t.co/a7LnGABckN

name: NPR
text:
In Iowa, Pres. Trump has only approved federal assistance for individuals in one Iowa county. There are 27 who asked for aid in the wake of the derecho, which has now been determined to have been the intensity of a Category 4 hurricane. (@IowaPublicRadio)

https://t.co/lh63yXm6qa
